Classes in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render used by org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.render

          Skeletal implementation of Panel, which also provides some helper methods that subclasses will typically need.

          Base class for all axis panels, which are panels that surround the center plot panel.

          Classes that wish to render Plot backgrounds must implement this

          Enumerator of the possible positions that this panel can occupy relative to its containing panel.

          Renders zoomable dates on x-axis (domain axis).

          Represents a dataset along with all the associated information needed to render it.

          Implemented by classes which wish to paint focus indicators for points

          Renders scatter plot, lines, points+lines, or filled areas depending on GSS styling used.
Panel
          Basic representation of a UI panel that has a size and screen position.
RangeAxisPanel.TickPosition
           
RenderState
          Used by a DatasetRenderer to determine how to render a given dataset curve and its constituent data points.
SelfResizing
          Any UI component that is capable of resizing itself to either an ideal or minimal size.
StringSizer
          Provides string pixel dimensions to a client.
ZoomInterval
          Represents one of the zoom intervals (1d, 1m, 1y, 10y, etc.) that appear in the legend axis.
ZoomIntervals
          A filterable always-sorted set of ZoomInterval objects, which provides the model for the zoom links in the legend axis.
ZoomListener
          Listens for requests to zoom into or out of the chart.
